subject: From Evergreen Bank
body:
From Evergreen Bank
3842 W 95th Street. Evergreen Park, IL 60805
Attn: Sir,
Compliment of the day to your and your family We are the
I hereby write to bring to your notice based on the meeting concluded last week regarding your unpaid fund of $2,500,000.00.
In regards to this, the bank has agreed that your unpaid fund will be released to you through the method of bank wire transfer into your nominated bank account.
Prior to this, you are advised to furnish your receiving bank account information as stated below for transfer processing/approval.
Wire Transfer Required information
 
1) Bank name:
2) Bank address:
3) Account no:
4) Routing no:
5) Swift Code:
6) Account name:
7) Address:
Await for your quick response with the required account details,
Thanks,
Yours in services
Yours faithful,
Darin Campbell
Head of Fund Transfer Dept Evergreen Bank

subject: Re:   From Evergreen Bank
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Evergreen Bank. I hope you are doing well. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding my unpaid fund. It's good to know that the bank has agreed to release it through a bank wire transfer.

Before I proceed, could you please clarify which meeting you are referring to? I want to make sure I have all the necessary details. Additionally, could you provide more information about the process of transfer processing approval? How long does it usually take?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jeffrey
